title: How to be a -10x Engineer
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#f2f2f2", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12];central_node[label="Become a -10x Engineer
(Waste 400 Engineering Hours/Week)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor="#ffcccc"];nullify_output[label="Nullify Output of 10 Engineers
(Obfuscate & Change Requirements)", shape=box];busywork[label="Create 400 Hours of Busywork
(Presentations, Diagrams, Rituals)", shape=box];burnout_turnover[label="Create 400 Hours of Burnout/Turnover
(Blame, Anger, Overtime)", shape=box];technical_discussion[label="Hold 10 Engineers Hostage in Technical Discussions
(Encourage Pointless Elegance)", shape=box];communication_overhead[label="Add 400 Hours of Communication Overhead
(Endless Meetings & Documents)", shape=box];cloud_costs[label="Waste 10 Weeks of Wages on Cloud Costs
(Slow Code, Bad DB, Exotic Hardware)", shape=box];useless_tools[label="Create Useless Tools
(Overcomplicated, Unused Scripts)", shape=box];compilation_time[label="Add 400 Hours of Compilation Time
(Slow Builds & Tests)", shape=box];pointless_tests[label="Write Pointless Tests
(Mocking, Randomness)", shape=box];bad_architecture[label="Waste 400 Hours on Bad Architecture
(Overfocus on Design)", shape=box];deployment[label="Waste 400 Hours on Deployment
(Fragile Systems, Frequent Migrations)", shape=box];unhappy_customers[label="Lose 10 Weeks of Wages on Unhappy Customers
(Bugs & Security Issues)", shape=box];worthless_docs[label="Write Worthless Documentation
(Private Messages, Unused Wikis)", shape=box];skunkworks[label="Trap Engineers in Futile Skunkworks Project
(Over-sell, Undersell, Undermine)", shape=box];dependencies_maintenance[label="Add Dependencies That Demand 400 Hours of Maintenance", shape=box];delay_pivoting[label="Delay Pivoting
(Drown in Sunk Cost)", shape=box];hire_0x[label="Hire 10 0x Engineers
(Deadweight in Team)", shape=box];hire_minus1x[label="Hire 5 -1x Engineers
(Resist Learning, Cause Catastrophes)", shape=box];prevent_firing[label="Prevent 10 -1x Engineers from Getting Fired
(Vouch for Bad Engineers)", shape=box];bug_triage[label="Incur 400 Hours of Bug Triage
(Undebuggable Code, Spaghetti, Abstractions)", shape=box];central_node->nullify_output;central_node->busywork;central_node->burnout_turnover;central_node->technical_discussion;central_node->communication_overhead;central_node->cloud_costs;central_node->useless_tools;central_node->compilation_time;central_node->pointless_tests;central_node->bad_architecture;central_node->deployment;central_node->unhappy_customers;central_node->worthless_docs;central_node->skunkworks;central_node->dependencies_maintenance;central_node->delay_pivoting;central_node->hire_0x;central_node->hire_minus1x;central_node->prevent_firing;central_node->bug_triage;}
